question: Which frequent flyers have traveled on flights with all three aircraft models (Airbus 340, Airbus 380, and Boeing 777-300)?
query:
SELECT ff.*
FROM postgres_air.frequent_flyer ff
JOIN postgres_air.account acct ON acct.frequent_flyer_id = ff.frequent_flyer_id
JOIN postgres_air.booking b ON b.account_id = acct.account_id
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON b.booking_id = bl.booking_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON f.flight_id = bl.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.aircraft ac ON ac.code = f.aircraft_code
WHERE ac.model IN ('Airbus 340', 'Airbus 380', 'Boeing 777-300')
GROUP BY ff.frequent_flyer_id, ff.first_name, ff.last_name, ff.title, ff.card_num, ff.level, ff.award_points, ff.email, ff.phone, ff.update_ts
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ac.model) = 3;
